description: Three young men leave the safety of the city to venture into the wild. Their fun ends when they kill the undead wife and daughter of a crazy old man.

title: After the Day 2: Before the Knight
description: The sequel to the political zombie thriller comedy, "After the Day." Following the tale of Giovanni Fish, more light is shed on the creation and establishment of the California Monarchy.

title: Helena's Cry
description:
Isabela bears a tormented life ever since the tragic death of her daughter Helena on a road accident; which is now currently investigated by two journalists: Sonia and Juan Ramón. Rumors have said that a strange apparition from beyond the dead is responsible for the killings of those unlucky ones traveling there by night. The reporters try to get to the bottom of the problem but what they uncover is an incoherent and incomprehensive history in which the evil forces seem eager to continue killing the innocent.

Isabela lleva una vida atormentada desde la trágica muerte de su hija Helena en un accidente automovilístico que ahora es motivo de investigación de los periodistas Sonia y Juan Ramón. Ya que se rumoran extrañas apariciones de un ser sobrenatural en el lugar del accidente lo que ha ocasionado la muerte de los que se atreven a transitarlo por las noches. Los reporteros se dan a la tarea de llegar al fondo del asunto pero se encuentran con una historia llena de incoherencias y sentimientos encontrados. Su cercanía con Isabela y su parapléjico marido les revela que las inexplicables apariciones tienen más relación con una trágica vida que con una trágica muerte. El llanto de Helena seguirá atrayendo a los curiosos pero su destino en común será La Muerte.

title: The Queen of Screams
description: A small group of teenagers are trapped in a deserted movie theater and stalked by a crazed B-movie actress out to kill for the demise of her career.

title: THE Shinrei Shashin: Yogen
description: Among the myriad of photographs that exist, there are some that cannot be explained in words. People who should not be there, strange patterns, deformed heads, too many limbs. Here are 46 of those photos, carefully selected.

title: Apocalypse Joy: Necronomicon Eros Kama
description: I certify to all that this is The one true Necronomicon Eros Kama. Distilled from the ancient scriptures and Magic apocryphons of the Great Old Ones laid down from the dawn of time.

title: Dark Gift
description: A psychological thriller and an in depth exploration into human behavior under extreme circumstances.

title: Project: Threshold
description: In 2004, six individuals were identified as being carriers of a deadly virus. Taken from their homes, they now find themselves mysteriously collared and locked in a communal cell, with no answers. They soon realize they are entangled in a web of deception, torture, and murder that all leads to a secret underground laboratory buried deep beneath the forest floor.

title: The Show Businessman
description: The day after the 2009 Academy Awards, a DVD-R was left anonymously at the LAPD's Hollywood Police Station. Kept in it's original form, the movie details an out-of-work production accountant turned filmmaker's decent into madness. ''Lost in La Mancha' meets 'The Blair Witch Project.'

title: Sleep Tight... A Bed Time Story
description: About a bed gone bad and the woman who can't get out. A femme horror short about a woman obsessed with an Estate sale four poster bed and what happens when you really do decide to stay in bed and hide under your covers.

title: Rojo sangre - 10 años a puro género
Contagio
description: Calvin and Iris's dream vacation turns into a nightmare when a satellite the government claimed to have destroyed crashes near their campsite and releases a deadly toxic cloud.

title: Sibling Rivalry
description: In the tradition of Italian horror from the 1960s, Sibling Rivalry is a dark tale of secrets, lies and masked killers run amok, while still retaining a sense of humor. Camille, 15, and her sister Ariana, 12, return to their secluded summer home on the isle of Victoria, where a year earlier, their mother committed suicide. Their father, James Stockman, producer of a popular TV series Memoirs of a Teenage Necromancer, insists that the trip is good therapy for them all. Shortly after arriving, Stockman is called back to Los Angles on 'business' leaving the girls home alone. In defiance, the girls throw a party with some local teens. That's when the fun begins. As the body count rises, multiple masked killers surface, and terrifying family secrets are revealed.

title: The New Boy
description: An audiobook for R.L. Stine's Fear Street novel, 'The New Boy'.

title: Dark Desire
description: Her desire is as much as he is dark.

title: Gritos en la noche
description: After fellow train passenger Gerado wakes journalist Noemi, she realizes she's missed her stop. She winds up joining Gerardo to attend his eminent father's funeral. But it turns out the death was a murder, and Noemi's curiosity may put her in danger. Her inquiries lead to a tale of sibling rivalry, profit-based murder and even the supernatural. Directed by Carlos Silva Nigri, this thriller from Argentina stars Vanina Balena and Alejandro Genes.

title: Hunted House
description: An Estate Agent is asked by a Priest to administrate the letting of a property bequeathed to a cat.

title: The Statement of Randolph Carter
description: When Vincent's monotonous case filing sends him a mysterious story involving a missing person by the name of Randolph Carter, he gets a little more than he bargained for.

title: Friday the 13th Part Viii: Jason Takes Manhattan - Gag Reel
description: Jason boards a cruise ship from Camp Crystal Lake to Manhattan killing obnoxious teenagers on the way.

title: The Bug in the Bathroom
description: A mysterious black briefcase. A journey from the farmlands to the urban landscape. A bug that isn't what it seems to be.

title: Lovecraft Paragraphs
description: A unique presentation of selected paragraphs from Lovecraft's work.

title: Feast
description: After returning home from the jungles of South America, anthropologist Nathan Haswell introduces a gruesome set of cannibalistic rituals to an unprepared world.

title: Aversion
description: Aversion is an action-packed tale of a private investigator who discovers too late that the woman who he's hired to follow...is possessed by a demon.

title: Living
description: About a woman who survives a zombie apocalypse alone in her apartment until she runs out of food and water and is forced to take an unusual step.

title: Death Happen
description: A crime reporter working for a Bangkok newspaper (Susira Angelina Naenna) teams up with a cop (Jason Young) to investigate a series of strange supernatural events that seems to be somehow linked to her father's death (and also to his inexplicable resurrection).

title: Vampire Abstracta
description: A docudrama thriller, set on the dark side of Hollywood, California. It follows two undercover police detectives as they track down a cult of vampire killers. Or not?

title: Detrás de la Muerte
description: Stories about spirits of dead people who stay among the living.

title: The Boys Club
description: Three men struggle for survival as their town is attacked by a multitude of rampant, deadly creatures. Who can they trust?

title: The Vampire Chronicles: Volume 4
description: "The Vampire Chronicles: Volume 4" is the fourth of five direct-to-dvd hosted horror movie, presented by "Johnny Legend".

title: A Night Off the Road
description: Steven, on a long drive, decides to stop for a night off the road at a very suspicious hotel.

title: Cut & Paste
description: A film producer is trying to sign the deal of a life time before a demented gimp kills the cast & crew to his latest film.

title: The Shackled Demon Project
description: On October 27th, 2009 Two boys filmed a documentary in Doug's home because he's been experiencing ghostly encounters in the middle of the night. The evidence that has been captured on film were not ghosts.

title: Open Stitch
description: Roi and Noa are a young Israeli couple, living together and in love. Roi wants more from this relationship: he wants Noa to stop fighting with him, and wants her to be the 'perfect' spouse. Following a Serious fight, and after an interesting class, Roi finds a 'surgical' solution to his wish. But soon he realizes that not all that glitters is gold, the grass is not always greener, and there are some things that should remain 'wishful thinking'. A romantic horror comedy.

title: The Sixth Senseless
description: Alan Knight is convinced by his friends that he's dead.

title: Villa: Sons of the Holocaust
description: Many of the Nazis still at liberty when in the 1950s nations closed books and turned over new leaves were hunted privately or publicly by Jewish vigilantes. Born in the shadow of murder and shame their various offspring, would eventually find each other. Maxim is a nice woman with a nice boyfriend, a nice home, a distant mother, a vague therapist and a foggy memory of her late father. With her bad dreams fast becoming her day to day reality she is pushed to edge of nervous endurance and will follow any path to end the nightmare. Villa. An atmospherically told and stylistically photographed psycho-drama frames the wilting mind of a woman, willfully hunted and victimized.

title: The Urban Legend of Syn - What I Want
Blood Trim 2: Curse of the Crimson Queef
description: An Unfinished Spurt by Chris Seaver. The Sequel to 2004's Blood Trim: The Bleeding. Only a small few have seen the full feature before it was stolen by a bitter cast member.

title: Kill Kane
description: Kill Kane is an epic tale of survival, friendship and the strength of the human spirit to stand up and fight for the continued existence of the human race. In a time when the government has declared a national emergency, when civilians have been ordered to remain indoors we remember that, this is Queensland mate, and we are gonna have some beers and f#$k these zombie, killer cane toads up!

title: C.R.Y. The Video Diary of Calvin Ray Young
Quantum Effect
description: A scientist is super positioned as prison chaplain after a particle accelerator experiment goes awry.

title: Dead Start
description: What would you do if the dead started to come back to life to feast on the living? That is what happens in Flickering Candle Productions new movie Dead Start. Ann (Linda Wylie) and Mark Savin (Chris Whitsett) slowly discover through live TV reports that zombies are attacking. After accepting the unbelievable, they must make life or death decisions before it is too late. Do they leave their life behind and go on the run or do they stay and fight? When the dead rise nothing will be the same. Dead Start.... You're Finished!

title: Insurgency of Ambition
description: The illusion of success lures a man to the very threshold of glory only to unsheathe its true, frightening nature as he gets within reach.

title: Mount Misery
description: Mount Misery Rd. is a place which has many trails that have been the cause of many mysterious events. A group of college students decides to investigate.

She settles in a small southern town in America. Suddenly there are disappearances and brutal killings so fear grips the citizens. It's up to the local law, Sheriff Taylor, with the help of CSI agent Poe to solve these mysteries.

On the run for four years, Brandon begins to have a normal life with Rachael and her son, until the past comes back to haunt him. Watched at every turn, he must not only confront the ultimate killing machine but the demons from with in his own soul.

The tales range from the frustrated life of a bachelor to the chaotic relationship of a husband and wife. A glimpse of these lives unfolds through the perspective of a four year old girl's eyes.

Now, as his visions become more intense, he knows that he is either going to die or get involved with a situation that might give him a little more time. His last obsession becomes to stop the death of at least one victim in his premonitions.

Sometimes they wish to spread fear, other times they are involved in near-slapstick comedy, and at times get into deep discussion on nearly any topic, all the while riding the edge of sanity! In the end they come to realize truths about their friendship.

title: Punnya Dee Raat
description: Watch the full movie, Punnya Dee Raat, only on Eros Now. Punnya Dee Raat is a 2009 Indian Punjabi film, directed by Santosh Dandekar and produced by Vijay Khepar. The film stars Vijay Khepar, Riya Singh, Romi Gill and Surinder Farishta in lead roles. The film had musical score by Simran Singh.

title: Twelve A.M.
description: Young Tyler decides to stay up late one Halloween night, and watch a spooktacular spook-a-thon consisting of old horror films. Little did he know that at the stroke of midnight, strange things would happen...

title: The Boys at Brunner Lake
description: A savage take on American horror films of the 1970s remixed with show tunes from the classic Gilbert and Sullivan musical 'The Pirates of Penzance'.

title: 5 Easy Steps to Pick Up on a Vampire's Girlfriend

description: Tired of getting sand kicked in his face, a 98lb-weakling Zombie must dig down deep to defeat the hulking Jock Zombie in order to win the heart of his beloved Beauty Zombie. This black and white, silent film features eerie, mist-shrouded locations, teeming with flesh-eating zombies who've devised a devilish method of luring unsuspecting motorists into their trap with the aid of a wheelchair-bound zombie and his comely attendant. A zom-rom-com with a haunting original score and a mouthful of laughs.

title: Static

Trapped in his building with two of his neighbors, he waits for an improbably rescue party. As the days pass, Henry discovers the terrifying lengths he will go to conquer his compulsive neuroses and survive.

title: The Hand
description: In this modern take on over the top plotted ridiculous horror B-movies. Johnny is an average teenager working on a summer project with his friend Alex helping to build a new school for the town. In an unfortunate accident he loses his hand. The hand becomes evil and attempts to kill everyone.

title: The Jones'

title: Mass Acre Hill

title: The Stop 6 Project

A documentary filmmaker vanishes while exploring a legend of Spontaneous Human Combustion (SHC) in a real urban community known as Stop 6. This is his story...

title: Villemolle 81
description: A parody of disaster and zombie movies by the mysterious Winshluss (aka Vincent Paronnaud, director of PERSEPOLIS). The story of dramatic events in small French town following a meteorite hit: everyone turns into zombies! The catastrophe takes place while a Parisian journalist is broadcasting a story about the event of the year; "The battle of Villemolle"; which is supposed to attract tourists to the town. Luckily, Villemolle's valiant mayor Frank Ballon and his sidekicks will lead an unrelenting battle against the bloodthirsty living dead! VILLEMOLLE 81 will make your day with its man hunt and chase scenes, handmade splatter, mutilation, and nuclear explosion scenes. Simultaneously, Vincent Paronnaud's newest film is a reflection on the position of the zombie in the contemporary French society. DIRECTOR'S NOTE: "The first half of the film assembles totally heterogeneous elements, among them an educational film about the hamster sausage and an animated propaganda film about the Zoltarian sect. [...] VILLEMOLLE 81 is above all a comic film. It's a subtle mixture of Rohmer and Romero."

Lovecraft: 'Some day the piecing together of dissociated knowledge will open up such terrifying vistas of reality...that we shall either go mad from the revelation or flee from the light into the peace and safety of a new dark age.' Google has actually proclaimed its mission is to 'organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.' The film combines the interfaces of social and geographical navigation to speak about the events leading up to the end of the world. By using the medium as the message, it is a horror film for a new age.

The third story, entitled "Little Billy's Bones," finds the son of a woodcutter falling prey to his murderous new stepmother, and things wind to a close in "White Wolf," in which a small town butcher makes a mint ridding the streets of wild wolves. When he reaches 500 kills and retires with money to spare, he finds himself faced with the prospect of hunting one last wolf.

Monoroi

In Japan. Far from being broke, MONOROI even allows the presence of some actors known in the casting.

title: Frontier: Prelude to Darkness
description: At the end of the 23rd century, Earth's empire in space - the Terran Imperial Union has begun a full-scale war with a civilization of humans who left earth over a hundred years ago - the Dakota Republic. Retired Air Force Major - John Caine (voiced by Lewis Roscoe) has lost his entire family to the Dakota, and now he has been recalled to active duty to locate the whereabouts of a ship that mysteriously went missing. He will be embedded into an invasion force that will be heading where the ship was last heard from. Private Rick Devers (voiced by Malcolm Klassen) is a new recruit to the Union Army, and has been rushed to the front-lines in the same invasion force as Caine. His unit will put down on an enemy planet only to discover a far worse enemy at work than the Dakota. Ensign Sarah Keller (voiced by Ashley Holland) is a Union chief communications officer of her ship, while on a secret mission behind enemy lines, her ship is sucked out of the fabric of space itself, and the Union is sending a large invasion force to find out where her ship went. In this epic science-fiction saga, these three characters will cross paths in a struggle against forces and creatures that are a prelude to a great darkness.

title: Hotel Aiken
description: In hopes of uncovering the mysteries of the infamous room 225, two paranormal investigators are the first in history to be granted permission to research the bizarre phenomenon.

title: Lurker
description: A teenager unwittingly lets the genie out of the bottle when he uses a bootleg copy that unleashes the vicious Lurker from his video-game prison. Then the games really begin.

title: The Dellville Witch
description: When Sarah Richter and her daughter Michelle move to Aunt Ida's old place in the country they find out her 'hobby' had unexpected consequences.

title: Tales of Terror: The Painted Face
description: There is a school where hangs a portrait of a female whose face has been painted over. If you scratch away a portion of the whitewash, the woman actually appears to haunt and harass you. Her face is said to defy description, so horrifying in fact that one wishes for death upon seeing it. This school forms the backdrop for female teen, Yayoi Himeno, who finds herself embroiled in a terrifying mystery.

title: The Graveyard Shift
description: A young man discovers that the afterlife isn't what he expected.

title: Help Wanted
description: Sideshow hires a new employee just before Spooktacular begins, and she has no clue what she's getting into. Before too long, the building is teeming with zombies, giant killer bees and dinosaurs and they have to figure out their escape.

title: Jake and Julie Vs. The Boogeyman!
description: A young girl must rescue her little brother from the Boogeyman.

title: THE Shinrei Shashin: Fuin
description: Some photos cannot be explained with words.

title: Isabelle's Secret
description: Not only is Isabelle stressed out at work she is being kept awake by noises at night. How does she solve her issues at work and the noises at home?
Two roommates must overcome their differences to battle forces of evil...and pay the bills on time.

title: Divine Decree
description: When an obsessed neighbor finds himself neglected by the woman he loves, he resorts to extreme measures prevent anyone else from having her. Then again for every action there's an equal and opposite reaction.

title: Summon Lovin'
description: A loveless young man, frustrated with his inability to attract a mate, summons a lust demon to help him become more confident with women.

title: Halloween Massacred: The Misadventures of a Fan Film Revealed
description: The behind the scenes misadventures of a group of filmmakers whose love of the Halloween film franchise gets the better of them when they try to make there own.

title: Fraid
description: A young man is confronted with his own fears while investigating in an old criminal case. As the world around him tumbles into a disturbing, nightmarish chaos, he eventually begins to realize the cause of his fears.

title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: The Harvest
Acesulfame Industries and Services
description: A woman attempts to command a brainwashed man into committing suicide.

title: Uncle Creepy Returns
description: "Uncle Creepy Returns" is a 2009 short animated movie with Julian Holloway as the voice of "Uncle Creepy".

title: Iris
description: When Quentin sketches the perfect pair of eyes, he's forced into violent madness through the control of a supernatural pair of eyes.

title: Tea: Regret Junket
description: Come to tea inside the minds of budding experimental filmmakers Nishell Falcone and Sydney Del Monte, where just one kiss from a mysterious woman of your dreams, at the most perfect of parties in the most interesting of locales, will be your last.

title: Midnight Alps
description: A man discovers a ticket and a stranger. After a transaction, the man finds himself trying to contain the stranger. All under the eyes of the watcher.

title: Crimson Currents
description: Destiny, the last survivor of Atlantis, is captured by pirates who sell women to an unknown nobleman. Little do the cutthroats know that their newest prisoner happens to be a vampire.

title: Dead of the Night
description: A young woman buys her first home and quickly realizes some hidden truths about herself and the houses former occupants. A spirit haunts her dreams warning her of the houses sinister past.

title: Remember
description: After his fathers death, Rufus returns to the house, where he spent his early childhood. He and his girlfriend want to spend some days at the lake, but after their arrival, strange occurrences happen. Figures seem to sneak around the house, trying to get in. Searching for traces of his childhood, memories come up in the mind of Rufus, leading him to the mysterious disappearance of his sister Sophie. In his visions he realizes, that she was put into an institute to be abused for clinical experiments. After her escape, she returned home, but her parents refused to let her in, being afraid of her violent behavior. Chased by the director of the institute, she then was drowned in the lake. Since this crime, she is haunting around the house, trying to get inside. After a night of revelation, Rufus decides to change the past, and opens the door to let Sophie in. This action alters the circumstances in the past, that led to her death, and gives her the chance to take revenge in order to return back to life.

title: Alone
description: A woman is haunted one night by someone from her past. Is it real or in her mind?

title: Super Rocket V8
description: In this creepy supernatural thriller, silent loner Riley Nagel (Warren Ray) mysteriously develops increased brain power that causes fearful flashbacks and horrific visions. After a visit by a strange traveling salesman (Tobin Fields) weird and unexplained events occur, suspicions arise and the authorities are notified.

title: Dawn of Abandonment
description: A Japanese exchange student discovers a never-ending string in his arm that he tugs until he looses his hair and his Japanese spirit.

title: Shreds of Humanity
description: A family struggling with relationship issues is suddenly confronted with an unknown terror outside their home in the remote countryside.

title: The Knackery
description: Set in the very near future, The Knackery is the latest hard hitting feature film from Belfast's leading independent production house, Yellow Fever Productions (makers of the award winning Battle Of The Bone). All is not as it seems on the country's most watched family game-show... Reality television has taken things to the extreme and given the public, The Knackery, a show where six contestants fight for the grand prize of 'one million pounds'. To liven things up, the producers of the show release a horde of genetically modified zombies which puts a little bit more pressure on the fighters, in this Big Brother style beat-em-up. As an undercover reporter tries to scoop the story he's been waiting for, he soon comes across a kid who has entered the arena unaware of the consequences. Seeing this as another excuse for higher ratings, the shows producers announce their new contestant as they witness the fighting skills of the youngster against others - but as the fighters get killed off, things take a turn for the worse leaving the reporter and kid to team up against some very tough opponents... human and not-so-human. Six contestants... One million quid... And a sh*t load of zombies!

title: 21st Century Crusade
description: This video depicts a character's struggle with the trappings of ideology.

title: The Most Fearful Stories by Junji Inagawa: Horrifying
description: Junji Inagawa tells the latest stories in his "Most Fearful Stories" series.

title: Nasty Splurty Brains
description: A psycho escapes, death ensues.

title: The Kaidan Suite
description: The Kaidan Suite combines music, theatrical performances, interactive stagecraft, and artistic editing to recreate the ancient Japanese practice of Hyakumonogatari Kaidankai (Gathering of 100 Ghostly Tales), in which ghost stories were told by diminishing candlelight.

title: Gosutokyatcha ga Totta! Kyofu Taiken: Akuryo-barai - Chitose Noroi Toshi Koto Kamakura
description: A horror documentary that explores the existence of a hauntings that lurks in the ancient capital of Kamakura.

title: Goosebumps Werewolf Skin Cartoon Network Commercial
description: A commercial for Goosebumps: Werewolf Skin.

title: Brinquedos
description: A young girl is threatened by dirty old men on her birthday in a small fishing village in northeastern Brazil.

title: The Elektra/Vampyr Variations
description: Imagine a woman listening to 'Elektra' by Richard Strauss while watching 'Vampyr' by Carl Dreyer and the dream she might then have that night.

title: House Guests
description: Four friends take advantage of a cousin's summer house in Maine when an intruder interrupts the fun and games. They better remember to lock the front door.

title: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi No Video 33
description: 33th entry in the popular "Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video" series.

title: The Strange Experiment of Doctor Purefoy
description: Corey's only hope of graduating is taking an extra credit job as assistant to the mysterious Professor Purefoy. What started off innocently soon spirals into a nightmare.

title: Tales of Terror: Recollection
description: After working their part-time jobs at a family restaurant, Shingo, Satoru and Yoshinori decide to visit a noted haunted spot. Convinced that they experienced something supernatural, they are returning home from the spot in a car when Yoshinori suddenly gets swallowed up by the backseat and simply vanishes. Shingo and Satoru are beside themselves until they find out from their boss and Yoshinori's supposed family members that their friend never existed.

title: Beware: The Children
description: Five psychotic children escape from a transport after killing the driver. They spend a Memorial Day weekend in the woods coming across hikers and killing them until they cross paths with a dysfunctional family.

title: Goosebumps: Return of the Mummy Cartoon Network Commercial
description: A commercial for Goosebumps: Return of the Mummy.

title: Flicker
description: After a light in the house mysteriously flickers on, a man investigates, unaware of the immediate danger.

title: Des rats
description: When David loses his job and his girlfriend, some rats enter his life.

title: Macabre Theatre Halloween Special
description: "Macabre Theatre Halloween Special" was a hosted television special that captures the true essence of Halloween in America; Natalie Popovich as host "Ivonna Cadaver".

title: Serial: Amoral Uprising
description: Who is Trenton Bracks? Well, What's there to say? Loyal and honest, he's a credit to southern gentlemen. Pleasant, carefree, and highly refined. He's got what it takes to be a model citizen. He's got looks and charm, a real lady-killer. Trenton seems to have a good head on his shoulders, and one in his hands, and one in the basement.

title: The Raven Reconstructed
description: Looks to Edgar Allan Poe's magazine article, The Theory of Composition, to take apart his most famous poem. Taking Poe at his word, it breaks the poem down into looped sequences within the framework of the poem itself exploring Poe's notion of effect. It gives 'The Raven' new meaning as it reconstructs it within the framework of contemporary sound theory and advant-garde film.

title: Memoria
description: Annie and Stephen are a young couple embarking on their honeymoon in Portugal. Shortly upon arriving, Annie encounters a mysterious figure from her past. After nearly drowning in a swimming pool, the nature of Annie's reality gradually begins to unravel. She quickly comes to believe that both her own fate and that of her husband lie in a delicate balance.

title: Scarlet Fry's Cinemacabre
description: "Scarlet Fry's Cinemacabre" has "Scarlet Fry", assisted by "Dead Head" and "Fygar" presenting the 1962 horror movie "Carnival of Souls".

title: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi No Video 34
description: 34th entry in the popular "Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video" series.

title: Hunnybear
description: When Kurt and his girlfriend Mindy go on a romantic trip to the woods, all hell brakes loose when they become the victim of a psychotic killers idea of fun that starts with a incredible car crash, and ends in a blood bath of terror.

title: Madness
description: A mystery horror story about Penelope, a loving wife, as she tries to survive the morning as she is fighting a familiar but deadly enemy...her mind.

title: Doppelgänger
description: A man returns to his locked apartment and meets his doppelganger inside. A conflict ensues with a tragic outcome.

title: Dark Mister
description: A detective, on a personal search for a man related to several crimes, encounters a dark and powerful force at a vacant house in this tale of addiction and demons...in every sense of the word.

title: El Bosque
description: A group of young people enters a forest, unaware that a psychopath killer is chasing them.

title: Sensations of the Season
description: Roll up, roll up. Come and see Unzie and his fantastical freak show. Conjoined twins, the worlds fattest singer - Unzie has it all. Come and see the freakiest show on Earth.

title: From Slumber
description: The tale of two screen writers working through writer's block, the results of which are horrific.

title: Spooky Skeleton Geckos from Outer Space
description: In this homage/spoof to low budget '70s slashers, three campers end up on the wrong side of a cult worshiping the evil space god Gekkos.

title: The Vampire Chronicles: Volume 3
description: "The Vampire Chronicles: Volume 3" is the third of five direct-to-dvd hosted horror movie, presented by "Johnny Legend".

title: The Most Fearful Stories by Junji Inagawa: Reproachful
description: Junji Inagawa tells the latest stories in his "Most Fearful Stories" series.

title: Fantastic Movie Trailers 3: Midnight Madness
description: Trailer compilation featuring material archived from original midnight shows features. Gross horror, sexy exploitation, crazy Sci-Fi, this DVD covers it all. Presented with genuine period theater intermissions and title reels.

title: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi No Video 35
description: 35th entry in the popular "Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video" series.

title: The Most Fearful Stories by Junji Inagawa: Terrible
description: Junji Inagawa tells the latest stories in his "Most Fearful Stories" series.

title: Shut Eye
description: All he wanted was sleep; his dwindling sanity versus external forces, as if in a sleepless void - an inevitable ultimatum.

title: The Loved Ones: Toronto International Film Festival Premiere and Q&A
originalTitle: The Loved Ones: Toronto International Film Festival Premiere + Q&A

title: Grasp
description: A 'video nasty' murder and bloodbath are intercut with abstract and fictional sequences, and home-video footage in a surreal deep-dive into the depths of madness: love, hate, nostalgia and fear all collide in this disturbing film collage.

title: THE Shinrei Shashin: Zekkyo
description: Among the myriad of photographs that exist, there are some that cannot be explained in words. People who should not be there, strange patterns, deformed heads, too many limbs. Here are 48 of those photos, carefully selected.

title: The Man in Dark Glasses
description: After middle-aged waitress Caroline survives her suicide attempt, she finds she is being stalked by a strange man in black clothes and dark glasses. Caroline believes this stranger is a private detective hired by her violent ex-husband, but the stranger's true identity will unveil a dark moment from Caroline's past.

title: Freaks from Hell
description: An evil cultist uses a combination of nuclear technology and magic to summon a skeleton from Hell. The skeleton then proceeds to go on a destructive rampage.

title: The Darkling
description: Death is only the beginning.

title: Revenge of the Hair
description: After a monstrous creature is set loose, two men must fight to survive, while trapped with the creature.

title: Pygmachophobia
description: One man struggles against the evil that is his room mates property and his love for his weed.

title: Revelations
description: A priest, his sister, and a reanimated corpse move into a haunted house.

title: Scrum
description: SCRUM is the story of two brothers--Simon and Arvin. They're both killers. Simon is a professional. Arvin is insane. Arvin suspects his wife, Emma, is having an affair with a golf pro. Arvin kidnaps and tortures the golf pro, and asks Simon to help him clean up the mess. This isn't the first time something like this has happened, and Simon wonders how much longer he can risk indulging his brother's paranoid delusions.

title: Euthination
description: A viral outbreak traps a group of slackers and causes them to reevaluate their lives, as well as fend for them.

title: Terror at Trout Lake
description: A one minute horror film - "Don't Watch Alone!!!!"
Two local students investigate a mysterious crime that involves the disappearance of a young girl.

title: How to Kill a Zombie
description: A training film on how to kill a zombie, set in the near future where zombies are a reality, but more of a nuisance than a threat.

title: Scared Stiff: Tiny's Halloween
description: It is a night of mystery. A night of magic. And a night of terror. On the scariest night of the year, a very large grown man is going house to house trick-or-treating. What are his true intentions; to get treats or to give tricks?

title: Soul Looting
description: Nefeli moves to her boyfriend's flat. After a while she discovers that strange hallucinations invade her life.
